thread.title: Bevo XIV is "still very sick and resting"
thread.title_full: Bevo XIV is "still very sick and resting"

title: Bevo XIV is "still very sick and resting"
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Bevo XIV is "still very sick and resting" The mystery surrounding what exactly is wrong with Bevo XIV remains, but an update on his condition was released Monday morning. Post to Facebook Bevo XIV is "still very sick and resting" The mystery surrounding what exactly is wrong with Bevo XIV remains, but an update on his condition was released Monday morning.  //kvue.tv/1RCPBni   Bevo XIV is "still very sick and resting" KVUE 12:42 p.m. CDT October 12, 2015 Bevo XIV CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
AUSTIN – The mystery surrounding what exactly is wrong with Bevo XIV remains, but an update on his condition was released Monday morning. 
On Bevo XIV's Twitter account, the University of Texas Silver Spurs said the Longhorns' mascot is "still very sick and is resting at his ranch." Update on BEVO XIV - he is still very sick and is resting at his ranch — BEVO XIV (@BEVO_XIV) October 12, 2015 
Bevo shocked Texas fans when he was not able to attend the annual Texas vs. Oklahoma Red River Rivalry Saturday. Last week, the Silver Spurs said Bevo would miss the game due to a "life-threatening condition" and that he was being cared for by his veterinarians. 
Bevo XIV has been the Texas mascot since taking over in 2004. Read or Share this story: http://kvue.tv/1RCPBni TOP VIDEOS
